snippet.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt - Cinematic Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
MIDNIGHT GHOST HUNT is a ghostly hide-and-seek multiplayer game!

SIGN UP FOR BETA: http://midnightghosthunt.com
NEXT BETA: JANUARY 2022, stay tuned for more details

Play as either Ghosts or Ghost Hunters.
The Ghosts hide inside inconspicuous furniture and hurl themselves at invading Hunters.
The Hunters must find and destroy all of the Ghosts before the clock strikes MIDNIGHT.
At MIDNIGHT, all dead Ghosts return as vengeful spirits!
The tables turn, the Hunters become the Hunted!
They must try to survive the Ghost onslaught until evac arrives.

Music: Remix of Midnight Ghost Hunt Main Theme by Ghostwood Empire
Composed for Midnight Ghost Hunt, will be available in game soundtrack at a later date

Developed by Vaulted Sky Games, Published by Coffee Stain Publishing

We're social, come say hi! 👋
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/915810/Midnight_Ghost_Hunt/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/MidnightGhostHunt
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayMGH
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playmgh
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayMGH
